General.Name: Headwater Gold Inc
General.Description: Headwater Gold Inc. engages in the acquisition and exploration of precious metal properties in the United States. The company primarily explores for gold. It holds interests in a portfolio of mineral properties located in the states of Idaho, Nevada, and Oregon. Headwater Gold Inc. was incorporated in 2019 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1130 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 4A4
